author: daxian-dbw
body:
Fix AppImage package name to be lower case 'powershell-..'
This makes the package name consistent with all the other Linux package names.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: Double checked the existing AppImage package. It prompts for desktop integration too, but the icon shown up in GNOME search is not the powershell icon. Opened the issue #5207

title: Fix AppImage package name to be lower case 'powershell-..'
